Rose’s Lime Juice is also a perfect accent for non-alcoholic beverages to add a splash of color and premium lime flavor. When it comes to a quality mixer, there are no exceptions or substitutions for the trusted brand Rose’s.

description:
We think that a margarita recipe should enhance the flavor of good tequila, not hide it. That's why the world-class Tres Agaves margarita is made only with organic lime juice, organic agave, and 100% agave tequila. You and be assured of enjoying a natural, great tasting, lower calorie margarita.

Directions
Shake well. How to Make the Tres Margarita: Uno: organic margarita mix + Dos: tequila + Tres: fresh lime wedge = Perfecto. The Tres Margarita: 2 oz Tres Agaves 100% agave tequila; 3 oz Tres Agaves organic margarita mix; fresh lime wedge (optional). Shake with ice, taste for balance and pour over fresh ice into your favorite rocks glass. Add a squeeze of fresh lime wedge & use as garnish. Salted rim optional. Refrigerate after opening. Shake gently amigos; there is real juice in there, so there will be some natural pulp.
title: Tres Agaves® Margarita - 1L Bottle

bullets: USDA and Oregon Tilth certified organic

description:
Tres Agaves organic bloody Mary mix is a bold new interpretation of an old classic. Taking a cue from our Mexican roots, we pair the conventional tomato base with the vibrant flavors of citrus and peppers to produce a mix with a fuller, more robust and powerful taste.

Directions
There is real fruit in here, so there will be some natural pulp. Shake well.
The Tres Bloody Mary:
1. 2 oz Tres Agaves 100% agave tequila (or your favorite vodka)
2. 4 oz Tres Agaves organic bloody Mary mix; fresh lemon wedge (optional)
3. your favorite garnish (optional).
4. Build with ice in your favorite Collins glass. Add a squeeze of fresh lemon and your favorite garnish.

Want to Make it Spicier? Additional Ingredients: 1 jalapeno or serrano pepper; 2 dashes Mexican hot sauce. Slice pepper lengthwise. Remove seeds. Muddle in shaker. Add bloody Mary mix, tequila, and your favorite Mexican hot sauce. Refrigerate after opening.
title: Tres Agaves® Bloody Maria - 1L Bottle

description:
Directions
Perfect Sriracha Mary:
1. Pint glass packed with ice cubes.
2. In a shaker. 4 oz. P&M Sriracha Bloody Mary mixer and 1-1/2 oz. vodka.
3. Gently shake and strain over ice.
4. Garnish: Celery stalk, wedge of lime, pickled long beans. Shake well. Tomatoes & spices may settle. Refrigerate after opening.
